ext.description: Auto Accept Agent: Automated Cursor and Antigravity workflow with Pro recovery tools.
config.cdpPort.description: Chrome DevTools Protocol port. Set to null to auto-detect from parent process --remote-debugging-port. If detection fails, ports 8997-9003 will be scanned.
config.localVipOverride.description: Force local VIP mode (for testing). Skips online license verification when enabled.
